entry.title: Bohème Roller
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Essential Oil Rollers
Price: 15.00

"I am a wild woman, it would take a warrior to tame my spirit."
- Nikki Rowe
☾

She is rich in knowledge, her intuition is strong, she is independent.  She shook off her chains of oppression and stepped into her full power.

This beautiful roller comes with a special blend of pure essential oils and contains energetically cleansed rainbow moonstone crystals.  Apply to the back of your neck, base of your throat, wrists, heart chakra and behind your ears.  Apply to hands and inhale while doing some deep belly breathing.

Relax, breathe, and reconnect with your feminine power.  You are magic.

10mL

ingredients: fractionated coconut oil, rainbow moonstone, essential oils of: citrus aurantium bergamia (bergamot), citrus sinensis (orange), boswellia carterii (frankincense), rosa damascena (rose), cananga odorata (ylang ylang), jasmina officinale (jasmine).

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.

entry.title: Joy Soak
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Bath Range
Price: 15.00

"Good things happen, love is real, we will be okay."
-Adam J. Kurtz
☾

Indulge yourself with our lighthearted, invigorating Joy Soak.  Pour your desired amount into a bath and relax while the magnesium soothes tired muscles and the flowers are a visual reminder to enjoy this moment of self love.  Himalayan salt promotes sleep, detoxification and stress reduction.  Pair with a glass of wine or cup of herbal tea for the ultimate evening bath.

320g

Ingredients: magnesium chloride flakes, pink himalayan salt, organic dried rose petals, dehydrated orange, orange essential oil, spearmint essential oil.

entry.title: Moon Soak

"As if you were on fire from within, the moon lives in the lining of your skin."
-Pablo Neruda

Calm and reconnect with this indulgent, moon ritual soak. For the full moon, the new moon, or any moon in between.  Ease stress and increase euphoria.  Pour your desired amount into a bath and relax while the magnesium soothes tired muscles and the flowers are a visual reminder to enjoy this moment of self love.  Himalayan salt promotes sleep, detoxification and stress reduction.  Pair with a glass of wine or cup of herbal tea for the ultimate evening bath.  Watch as your bath turns a beautiful shade of blue.

280g

Ingredients: magnesium chloride flakes, pink himalayan salt, organic blue butterfly pea flowers, dried lotus petals, rose buds, organic dried blue butterfly pea flower powder, jojoba oil, blue lotus essential oil.

entry.title: Be
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Crystal Infused Sprays
Price: 20.00

"Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak."
-Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati
☾
Almost everything works again if you unplug it for a bit... including you beautiful!  Be still, Be present, just Be.  

Mist this beautiful blend across your upper body before meditation or when you need some grounding.  It's also useful to mist your meditation space to prepare the energy of the room.

100mL

ingredients: purified water, clear quartz, leuconostoc (radish root ferment), essential oils: citrus aurantium bergamia (bergamot), boswellia carterii (frankincense), picea mariana (black spruce), cananga odorata (ylang ylang), cedars atlantica (cedarwood).

entry.title: Full Moon Ritual Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: New Releases
Price: 22.00

'Release what's holding you back.'
☾

The Full Moon and the week leading up to it can bring some crazy energy with it.  However, it's the best time to light up intentions and bring some action to them, allowing them to fully manifest.  It's a magical time to activate the Law of Attraction.

A key to bringing your intentions to life is in the releasing of blocks and things that may be holding you back.  This blend has been intuitively and specifically blended for this purpose and is the perfect companion to your 'New Moon' Ritual Blend.

Rituals are a beautiful way to develop a deeper connection to the Universe within.  Show up with an open heart, an open mind, and the willingness to be open to all possibilities.

This limited edition blend is made on the Full Moon and is only available in small quantities each month.  Due to it's potent and rich list of ingredients, it has been diluted to 50% with pure organic sweet almond oil. 

My intention is that it will be used intuitively in your Full Moon rituals, applied to your body during self massage and meditation, inhaled, diffused, and applied to your list of intentions to recharge them.

It is a good idea to clear your space prior to starting your rituals.  This can be done by misting your Sage spray, diffusing your Sage diffuser blend or by lighting your favourite smudge stick.

 10mL

ingredients: sweet almond oil, citrus aurantifolia (lime), salvia sclaria (clary sage), boswellia carterii (frankincense), cananga odorata (ylang ylang), pogostemon cablin (patchouli), jasmina officinale (jasmine), rosa damascena (rose).

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.  Please seek advice from your physician if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.

entry.title: New Moon Ritual Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Diffuser Blends
Price: 22.00

'For setting one's intentions'

☾

The New Moon is an invitation to start fresh, set intentions and connect with the energy of the moon.

Rituals are a beautiful way to develop a deeper connection to the Universe within.  Show up with an open heart, an open mind, and the willingness to be open to all possibilities.

This limited edition blend is made on the New Moon and is only available in small quantities each month.  Due to it's potent and rich list of ingredients, it has been diluted to 50% with pure organic sweet almond oil. 

My intention is that it will be used intuitively in your New Moon rituals, applied to your body during self massage and meditation, inhaled, diffused, and applied to your list of intentions to charge them.

A perfect companion to your 'Full Moon' Ritual Blend. 

It is a good idea to clear your space prior to starting your rituals.  This can be done by misting your Sage spray, diffusing your Sage diffuser blend or by lighting your favourite smudge stick.

 

Ingredients:  sweet almond oil, citrus sinensis (orange), salvia officinalis (sage), picea mariana (black spruce), lavandula augustifolia (lavender), rosa damascena (rose), commiphora myrrha (myrrh).

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.  Please seek advice from your physician if you are pregnant or breastfeeding.

entry.title: Rose Soak
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Bath Range
Price: 9.00

Indulge and relax with this feminine and sensual, rose infused magnesium soak. 

Pour your desired amount into a bath and relax while the magnesium soothes tired muscles and the rose petal powder smooths skin.  Himalayan salt promotes sleep, detoxification and stress reduction.  Pair with a glass of wine or a cup of herbal tea for the ultimate evening bath.

120g

Ingredients: magnesium chloride, sodium chloride (pink himalayan salt), rosa centifolia (organic pink rose petal powder), dried flowers: rosa centifolia (rose), pure essential oil: pelargonium roseum (rose geranium).

entry.title: Sage Diffuser Blend
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Diffuser Blends
Price: 18.50

"Your personal sage smudge in a bottle."

☾

Our Sage essential oil diffuser blend is perfect for cleansing your space of negative energy.  Your personal sage smudge in a bottle.  

This blend is particularly useful for eradicating unpleasant odours. Not suitable for use during pregnancy.

Add 4-10 drops to your diffuser and run for 30-60 minutes.

I love to use this blend to clear the space prior to performing any rituals, such as Full and New Moon rituals or vision boarding.  I find it really allows my optimism and creativity to flow.

10mL

Ingredients: salvia officinalis (sage), prunus amygdalus dulcis (sweet almond oil), bursera graveoleus (palo santo), cymbopogon flexuosus (lemongrass), romarinus officinalis (rosemary), melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree), lavandula augustifolia (lavender), myrtus communis (myrtle).

entry.title: Focus
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Diffuser Blends
Price: 18.50

"Be about actions, not distractions"
☾

You have a million things on your to do list but you're feeling the pressure to be more mindful, more present.  How can you lean in to your magic when there are so many distractions?

Raise your motivation levels and maintain concentration.  'Focus' is great for memory recall and ideal for use during work or study.  May relieve symptoms of nervous tension.  

Directions: Add 4-10 drops to your diffuser.

Allow your magic to flow once you ground and focus. ★

10mL

Ingredients:  essential oils of:  romarinus officinalis (rosemary), cymbopogon flexuosus (lemongrass), mentha piperita (peppermint), citrus aurantifolia (lime), picea mariana (black spruce), piper nigrum (black pepper).

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.

entry.title: Jasmine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: New Releases
Price: 22.00

"Some women fear the fire, some women simply become it."
☾

Mother Nature has made the most rich and sensual perfume from 'plants that wake when others sleep'.  Jasmine is known for being an aphrodisiac and is associated with love, beauty & sensuality.  Apply to pulse points as you would with regular perfume, be sure to inhale and remember the goddess that you are.  

This beautiful 10ml roller comes with a special blend of pure essential oils and contains energetically cleansed rose quartz crystals.

Ingredients include: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Rose Quartz Crystal, Jasmina Officinale Grandiflorum (Jasmine Essential Oil)

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.

- Jonny Ox

entry.title: Luna
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Diffuser Blends
Price: 18.50

"You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one"
- John Lennon
☾

Who wouldn't wish to not only fall asleep, but to fall asleep happy.

Calm the thoughts in your mind and drift off to sleep with feelings of contentment.  Can be useful to diffuse in the lead up to children's bedtime and calm the entire family in the evening hours.

Add 4-10 drops to your diffuser or inhale directly.

10mL

 

FRAGRANT INFLUENCE:

Lavender:  Calming, relaxing, and balancing, both physically and emotionally.

Mandarin: Calming, relaxing, promotes feelings of contentment, uplifting, curbs stress-induced insomnia.

Cedarwood:  Stimulates the pineal gland, which releases melatonin.  Recognized for its calming, purifying properties.

Frankincense:  Increases spiritual awareness, promotes meditation, improves attitude, and uplifts spirits.

 

ingredients: 100% pure essential oils of: lavandula augustifolia (lavender), citrus reticulata (mandarin), cedars atlantica (cedarwood), boswellia carterii (frankincense).

entry.title: Joy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Diffuser Blends
Price: 18.50

~ Joy is her middle name ~

☾

Bring happiness to the heart with this magnetic blend.  Uplifting, can help to balance emotions by either relaxing or stimulating as needed.  May help you to move forward and eliminate blocked personal growth.  Assists with gratitude practice and pleasant feelings in the heart, mind, and soul.

Add 4-10 drops to your diffuser or inhale directly.

10mL

 

FRAGRANT INFLUENCE:

Orange:  Fresh and uplifting.  An Mie (Japan) University study found that citrus fragrances boosted immunity, induced relaxation, and reduced depression (Komori, 1995).

Spearmint:  Opens and release emotional blocks and brings about a feeling of balance and a lasting sense of wellbeing.  Reduces fatigue.

Ylang Ylang:  Balances male-female energies, enhances spiritual attunement, combats anger, combats low self esteem, increases focus of thoughts, filters out negative energy, restores confidence and peace.

Rose:  It helps bring balance and harmony, allowing one to overcome insecurities.  The effect of rose on the heart brings good cheer with calming and a lightness of spirit.  The oil of love.

 

ingredients: pure essential oils of: citrus sinensis (orange), mentha spicata (spearmint), cananga odorata (ylang ylang), rosa damascena (rose).

entry.title: Wish
entry.summary:

Type: Diffuser Blends
Price: 18.50

"You are not a drop in the ocean, you are the entire ocean in a drop"
- Rumi

Uplift and give clarity to your thoughts, support self belief and confidence.  Awaken awareness and visualise your goals and dreams more vividly.  Restore feelings of hope and support meditation and manifesting your desires.

You are more powerful than you realise, sometimes you just need to believe.

Add 4-10 drops to your diffuser or inhale directly.

10mL

FRAGRANT INFLUENCE:

Black Spruce:  Releases emotional blocks, bringing about a feeling of balance and grounding.

Balsam Fir:  Grounding, stimulating to the mind, and relaxing to the body.

Bergamot:  Mood lifting qualities.  May help relieve scattered thoughts while promoting focus and clarity.

Frankincense:  Increases spiritual awareness, promotes meditation, improves attitude, and uplifts spirits.

Coriander:  Soothing and calming.

Ylang Ylang:  Balances male-female energies, enhances spiritual attunement, combats anger, combats low self esteem, increases focus of thoughts, filters out negative energy, restores confidence and peace.

Rose: It helps bring balance and harmony, allowing one to overcome insecurities.  The effect of rose on the heart brings good cheer with calming and a lightness of spirit.  The oil of love.

 

ingredients: 100% pure essential oils of: picea mariana (black spruce), abies balsamea (balsam fir), citrus aurantium bergamia (bergamot), boswellia carterii (frankincense), coriandrum sativum (coriander), cananga odorata (ylang ylang), rosa damascena (rose)

entry.title: Peace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Diffuser Blends
Price: 18.50

~ Peace begins from within, if you are not peaceful inside,
the world you see will be chaotic ~
☾

Our dream is to go about our day wrapped in feelings of peace, contentment, flow and calm.  Almost like a post-meditation bliss, this blend is the closest thing we have found to that feeling.

Fill your home or office with the calming aroma of 'Peace'.  Promotes relaxation, patience and emotional wellbeing, easing tensions and calming overactive minds and energies.  Balance emotions and relieve worries.

Place 4-10 drops into your diffuser or inhale directly.

10mL

Flow like a goddess (because you obviously are!)

 

FRAGRANT INFLUENCE:

Tangerine:  Promotes happiness, calming, helps with nervousness.  An Mie (Japan) University study found that citrus fragrances boosted immunity, induced relaxation, and reduced depression (Komori, 1995).

Black Spruce:  Releases emotional blocks, bringing about a feeling of balance and grounding.

Lavender:  Calming, relaxing, and balancing, both physically and emotionally.

Lime:  Mood uplifter.

Ylang Ylang:  Balances male-female energies, enhances spiritual attunement, combats anger, combats low self esteem, increases focus of thoughts, filters out negative energy, restores confidence and peace.

Frankincense:  Increases spiritual awareness, promotes meditation, improves attitude, and uplifts spirits.

Amyris:  Lifts away stress and anxiety, provides grounding and soothing qualities.  Lifts the spirit and helps instill a sense of calm.

ingredients: 100% pure essential oils of: citrus reticulata (tangerine), picea mariana (black spruce), lavandula augustifolia (lavender), citrus aurantifolia (lime), cananga odorata (ylang ylang), boswellia carterii (frankincense), amyris balsamifera (amyris)

- Pema Chödrön

entry.title: Moon
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Crystal Infused Sprays
Price: 20.00

~ The sun and the moon sometimes argue
over who will tuck me in at night ~

☾

Our busy, full lives often get in the way of experiencing the peaceful evening energy.  We were once so connected to the moon and many of us are reconnecting once again.

Mist to refresh sheets, pillows, baby seat, pram or whatever your heart desires for a clean & relaxing energy. 

A restful blend of pure essential oils and Full Moon charged amethyst crystals.  Amethyst guards against nightmares and insomnia, aids meditation and visualisation, reduces hyperactivity in children, also known as nature's tranquilizer.

Experience a shift in your energy and that of your place of slumber.

100mL

entry.title: Joyful
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Crystal Infused Sprays
Price: 20.00

~ Add some joyful energy to your space. ~

☾

Your Joyful energy spray contains my favourite uplifting blend of essential oils and is infused with energetically cleansed rose quartz.  Use to cleanse or refresh your auric field or add some joyful energy to your space.

Rose quartz carries a soft feminine energy of compassion and peace, tenderness and healing, nourishment and comfort. It speaks directly to the Heart Chakra, dissolving emotional wounds, fears and resentments, and circulates a Divine loving energy throughout the entire aura. Reawakening the heart to its own innate love, it provides a deep sense of personal fulfillment and contentment, allowing one the capacity to truly give and receive love from others.

entry.title: Sage
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Crystal Infused Sprays
Price: 20.00

"Your personal sage smudge in a bottle."

☾

Sage energy spray is perfect for cleansing your space of negative energy.  Your personal sage smudge in a bottle.  Mist the room when visitors leave or spray on yourself to cleanse your aura.

This blend contains the power of essential oils plus it is infused with energetically cleansed black tourmaline.  

Black tourmaline is a powerful grounding stone, electrical in nature, providing a connection between Earth and the human spirit. It's supportive energy aligns the energy centers of the body and channels healing light throughout the system.  Useful for providing protection and elimination of negative energy.

You're far too special to carry around unwanted, stale energy.  Release the negativity and step into your true self.

100mL

ingredients: purified water, black tourmaline, leuconostoc (radish root ferment), essential oils: salvia officinalis (sage), bursera graveolens (palo santo), cymbopogon nardus (citronella), romarinus officinalis (rosemary), cymbopogon flexuosus (lemongrass), melaleuca alternifolia (tea tree), lavandula augustifolia (lavender), myrtus communis (myrtle).
